item.title: About
item.description: R-Ladies PDX is part of a worldwide organization to promote gender diversity in the R community. We aspire to encourage and support women in Portland interested in learning or sharing their knowledge of R. For more information, contact us at pdx@rladies.org. R-Ladies PDX seeks to create a space where women are empowered to teach and are comfortable with asking questions. We welcome all those who will help us toward that goal.
